channel.title: Development Data Partnership
channel.description: Recent content on Development Data Partnership

item.title: A Light Primer to Spark / Databricks
item.description: Databricks is a powerful platform for using Spark, a powerful data technology. If you’re reading this, you’re likely a Python or R developer who begins their Spark journey to process large datasets.

item.title: Analyzing Spatial Accessibility of Health Facilities in Indonesia and Philippines
item.description: Challenge: Indonesia and the Philippines are archipelagos, where geographic and administrative boundaries are similar. The collection of islands is home to different concentrations of ethnic, cultural, linguistic, and socioeconomic groups, with an imbalanced distribution of health facilities and physicians.

item.title: Google, Apple, and Facebook: Understanding Mobility during Social Distancing with Private Sector Data
item.description: As countries around the world work to contain the spread and impact of COVID-19, the World Bank Group is moving quickly to provide fast, flexible responses to help developing countries strengthen their pandemic response and health care systems.
